title: 108_s3009
content: National Food and Agricultural Science Act of 2004 - Establishes: (1) in the National Science Foundation a Division of Food and Agricultural Science, which shall be administered by a Director of Food and Agricultural Science. And (2) in the Division a Standing Council of Advisors. States that the Division's sole function shall be to award grants to promote complementary, fundamental agricultural research to: (1) individual scientists, (2) single and multi-institutional research centers. And (3) private and public sector entities, including the Department of Agriculture, the Foundation, or other Federal agencies.
